description:
Ajaxterm in tools/ajaxterm has patches that allow it to work in a multi-node configuration. The version of ajaxterm in trunk ppa does not have these patches.

The specific thing I notice missing is the patch that runs ajaxterm on 0.0.0.0 instead of localhost.
title: ajaxterm in trunk ppa missing patches needed for functional multi-node install

comments.content:
Ajaxterm in tools/ajaxterm has patches that allow it to work in a multi-node configuration. The version of ajaxterm in trunk ppa does not have these patches.

The specific thing I notice missing is the patch that runs ajaxterm on 0.0.0.0 instead of localhost.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rlane

comments.content: Not really a Nova issue, but for lack of a better place, let's track this here.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
